Interface File

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Audio, DimensionableFile, Document, DurationableFile, PhotoSize, Sticker, Video, Voice
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AudioImpl, DocumentImpl, PhotoSizeImpl, StickerImpl, VideoImpl, VoiceImpl

    public interface File
    Author:
    Zack Pollard

      • getFileDownloadLink

        default java.lang.String getFileDownloadLink(TelegramBot telegramBot)
        Gets the download link for this file
        Parameters:

      • downloadFile

        default java.io.File downloadFile(TelegramBot telegramBot,
                                  java.io.File downloadLocation)
        Downloads the file to a set location on disk
        Parameters:
        telegramBot - The TelegramBot instance that relates to this file
        downloadLocation - A File object pointing to the location where you want to download the file
        Returns:
        A File object that points to the downloaded file
